headline: Carrier Global Enhances AI-Powered Abound App for Proactive Building Management
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE:CARR) is one of the best manufacturing stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On June 25, Carrier Global Corporation announced significant enhancements to its Abound Insights Assistant app. These updates are designed to empower building managers and facilities teams to proactively manage equipment operations and streamline maintenance activities. The Abound Insights […]
